'''''The Boggit''''' is a parody of the [[1982]] video game ''[[The Hobbit (1982 video game)|The Hobbit]]'', being the sequel to the [[1985]] game ''[[Bored of the Rings (video game)|Bored of the Rings]]''.<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/boggit.html Tolkien Games] (retrieved 26 October 2010)</ref> The game was written by [[Fergus McNeill]] and [[Judith Child]].<ref name="Spectrum"/><ref name="Tolkien Games"/>

It is divided into three parts, and includes a hidden game.<ref>[http://www.jonlan.demon.co.uk/spectrum/gamefaq/gamefaq5.html#5.3 The Spectrum Games FAQ] (retrieved 26 October 2010)</ref>
